gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.protocol.http
Class Bo2WicketSession<A,L>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.wicket.Session
      org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.WebSession
          gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.protocol.http.Bo2WicketSession<A,L>
Type Parameters:
A - Type of authorization identifier.
L - Type of language id.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Session<A,L>, Serializable, org.apache.wicket.event.IEventSink, org.apache.wicket.IClusterable
public class Bo2WicketSession<A,L>
extends org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.WebSession
implements Session<A,L>

Common base class for Bo2 wicket application sessions.

See Also:

isAuthorized

public boolean isAuthorized(A authorizationId)
Description copied from interface: Session
Checks if this session is authorized for the action that is controlled by an authorization control identified with the authorizationId. This method can delegate to the method of the user, but it exists also in the session, since a session could exist without a user.

Specified by:
isAuthorized in interface Session<A,L>
Parameters:
authorizationId - Id of the authorization controlling the action.
Returns:
Returns true if the user is authorized for the action controlled by the specified is action.

isLogin

public boolean isLogin()
Description copied from interface: Session
Indicates if the user has been logged in.

Specified by:
isLogin in interface Session<A,L>
Returns:
Returns true if the user has logged in, otherwise returns false.
